title: 4 Ways to Cancel Your Facetune Subscription & Get a Refund

steps.title: Open the “Settings” app and tap on your name.
steps.content: Open the “Settings” app and tap on your name. On the iPhone connected to your Facetune account, select “Settings,” or the app that looks like a gray cog icon. Click on your name at the top of the screen, which is located above the text “Apple ID, iCloud+, Media & Purchases.”

steps.title: Hit the “Subscriptions” button and choose “Facetune.”
steps.content: Hit the “Subscriptions” button and choose “Facetune.” The “Subscriptions” button is located under the “Payment & Shipping” button. Once you click on it, a list of all your active subscriptions will pop up. Select your “Facetune” subscription to modify or cancel it.

steps.title: Click on “Cancel Subscription” at the bottom of the screen.
steps.content: Click on “Cancel Subscription” at the bottom of the screen. Read the on-screen instructions to finalize your cancellation, then hit “Confirm.” The expiration date of your subscription will be listed underneath the text “You’ve canceled your subscription.” You still have access to your subscription until the end of your membership.

steps.title: Open the “Google Play Store” app and tap on your profile.
steps.content: Open the “Google Play Store” app and tap on your profile. Logged into the same account connected to your Facetune subscription, click on the Google Play Store app —it looks like a triangle with green, blue, red, and yellow colors inside of it. Navigate to the top right corner of the screen and select the profile icon. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the “Payments & subscriptions” button and select “Subscriptions.”
steps.content: Tap the “Payments & subscriptions” button and select “Subscriptions.” Once the pop up menu opens, hit the “Payments & subscriptions” button that is located under “Offers and notifications.” Then, click on the “Subscriptions” button to pull up a list of all your active and inactive subscriptions. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Click on “Facetune,” then hit “Cancel subscription” at the bottom of the screen.
steps.content: Click on “Facetune,” then hit “Cancel subscription” at the bottom of the screen. Follow the on-screen instructions to finalize your cancellation. Once your current billing period ends, you will not be charged for Facetune. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Go to Facetuneapp.com and log into your account.
steps.content: Go to Facetuneapp.com and log into your account. Enter your email address, along with the 6-digit verification code that is sent to your email. Once you sign in, you can manage your Facetune subscription. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Click on the “Cancel Subscription” button next to “Facetune.”
steps.content: Click on the “Cancel Subscription” button next to “Facetune.” On the top of the page, there is a list of all your active subscriptions. Select the “Cancel Subscription” button beside the “Facetune” tab to terminate your subscription or trial. [5] X Research source If you don’t see a “Cancel Subscription” button, email a screenshot of your invoice to facetune.support@lightricks.com to cancel your subscription or trial. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Sign in to your PayPal account and click the gear icon.
steps.content: Sign in to your PayPal account and click the gear icon. On the PayPal home page , click on the “Log in” button in the top right corner of the screen. Enter your email address and password to access your account. Then, hit the gear icon in the top right corner of the screen (next to “Log out”). [7] X Research source

steps.title: Hit the “Payments” tab and then click “Automatic payments.”
steps.content: Hit the “Payments” tab and then click “Automatic payments.” The “Payments” tab is located in the top and center of the screen, to the right of the “Data & Privacy” tab. Once you click on it, scroll to the bottom of the page and hit “Automatic payments.” [8] X Research source

steps.title: Select “Facetune” and hit “Remove PayPal as your payment method.”
steps.content: Select “Facetune” and hit “Remove PayPal as your payment method.” On the left side of the screen, there is a list of all your active subscriptions. Click on Facetune, then scroll to the bottom of the page. Hit the “Remove PayPal as your payment method” button at the bottom of the screen to deactivate autopay and cancel your subscription. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Email customer service at facetune.support@lightricks.com.
steps.content: Email customer service at facetune.support@lightricks.com. If you can’t cancel your Facetune subscription on mobile or desktop, shoot the company an email for additional help. If you’re using Facetune on iOS, the customer service email is facetune.support@lightricks.com. The customer service email for Android users is facetune.android.support@lightricks.com. [10] X Research source Alternatively, get help through the app by tapping the Facetune logo in the upper right corner of the homescreen, then clicking “Support” and “Contact Us.”

steps.title: Contact customer service and submit a request form to be refunded.
steps.content: Contact customer service and submit a request form to be refunded. If you notice charges on your account after canceling your subscription, take a screenshot of your receipt and send it to Lightricks, the company that runs Facetune. Submit their request form online, and be sure to include your email address and a detailed message about your request. [11] X Research source If you have charges through the App Store, reach out to Apple Support directly to resolve your issue. Alternatively, contact Facetune customer service by sending an email to facetune.support@lightricks.com. [12] X Research source
